blogPost.excerpt: The app shows the UTC time in the menu bar or a Notification Center widget. This can be useful as a quick reference. You can also quickly copy the date & time in ISO8601 format. The app is free and requires macOS 11.1.
blogPost.body: The app shows the UTC time in the menu bar or a Notification Center widget. This can be useful as a quick reference. You can also quickly copy the date & time in ISO8601 format. The app is free and requires macOS 11.1.
blogPost.title: UTC Time - Show the time in UTC in the menu bar or a widget
blogPost.author: Sindre Sorhus

localize.description: 该应用程序在菜单栏或通知中心小部件中显示UTC时间。这可以作为一个快速的参考。你也可以快速复制ISO8601格式的日期和时间。该应用程序是免费的，需要macOS 11.1。
localize.tagline: 在菜单栏或小部件中以UTC显示时间。

localize.description: 該應用程序在菜單欄或通知中心小部件中顯示UTC時間。這可以作爲一個快速的參考。你也可以快速複製ISO8601格式的日期和時間。該應用程序是免費的，需要macOS 11.1。
localize.tagline: 在菜單欄或小部件中以UTC顯示時間。

previous.excerpt: SaaS Competition is increasing rapidly. The more competition a company faces, the harder it is to get clients. If you don’t have strong positioning on the market, use this worksheet to create unique positioning. The Worksheet is FREE until 25th March.
previous.title: SaaS Positioning Worksheet - Worksheet to create $1M SaaS positioning

localize.description: SaaS的竞争正在迅速增加。公司面临的竞争越大，获得客户的难度就越大。如果你在市场上没有强大的定位，请使用这个工作表来创建独特的定位。该工作表在3月25日之前是免费的。
SaaS的競爭正在迅速增加。公司面臨的競爭越大，獲得客戶的難度就越大。如果你在市場上沒有強大的定位，請使用這個工作表來創建獨特的定位。該工作表在3月25日之前是免費的。
